verbose_text: Surprisingly, IFN-gamma production was completely abrogated in CD4 -/-, but not CD8 -/- BALB/c mice infected with T. brucei brucei 10-26 based on measurement of IFN-gamma in plasma and spleen cell cultures, suggesting that IFN-gamma is produced mainly by CD4 + T cells, but not CD8 + T cells in BALB/c mice infected with T. brucei brucei 10-26, which is consistent to the observation in mice infected with T. congolense.
evidence: IFN-gamma is produced mainly by CD4 +  T cells, but not CD8
